title: Buridava Roman Fort and Vicus
description: A Roman fort and associated structures at modern Stolniceni, Romania. An indigenous settlement was likely located a few kilometers to the north.

properties.description: Location determined in Google Earth using imagery labeled "2023 Maxar Technologies" with reference to figures 17.3-17.7 on pages 62-65 of Țentea 2021.
properties.title: Imagery Location of excavated bathhouse

properties.description: Location determined in Google Earth against imagery against historical (2012) imagery with reference to crop marks visible in 1966 Corona satellite photograph published as figure 17.2 on page 62 of Țentea 2021.
